channel.title: How do I fix this?[Using WinformsC#]
channel.description: ![image|690x432](upload://1LZeNSHfgzBaKuE9EvohvlLgn7b.png) I followed the tutorial correctly and honestly been stuck a few days so anything would help.

item.title: How do I fix this?[Using WinformsC#]
item.dc:creator: OverDrive
item.description:
Its File.WriteAllText(C:\username.txt, username.Text);
Then just have it check if the file exists and if not continue with normal operation

Dm me on discord if you want a more in depth explanation

OverDrive#0001

Read full topic

item.title: How do I fix this?[Using WinformsC#]
item.dc:creator: lIMonkieIl
item.description:
they are names of text boxes, so on your form make sure you have text boxes called that or make your own text boxes and call them whatever you like and change username to your username text box name and change password to your password text box name and so on
